scripts.start: npm run prepare && npm run sass
scripts.prepare: rm -rf webfonts js && mkdir webfonts js && cp node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/webfonts/* webfonts && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.slim.min.js js/jquery.slim.min.js
scripts.watch: npm run prepare && npm run sass -- -w
scripts.build: npm run start && rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp -a index.html css js img webfonts dist/
